channel.title: [PI] How to 2x xp rate
channel.description:
Hey,
i was wondering where do I go to edit the amount of xp you get per skill, so I can change it to 2x or 5x the normal amount. Thanks

item.title: [PI] How to 2x xp rate
item.dc:creator: @underdrive underdrive
item.description:
@underdrive wrote:

or you can go into client and search for
*hitdiff
and change the number right before it
that elminates all the looking and stuff

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How to 2x xp rate
item.dc:creator: @mod_mortl mod mortl
item.description:
@mod_mortl wrote:

You go into config.java and scroll all the way down and you'll see the Xp for them and it will also have the Skills also if you have those in your source, and scroll up a little from skills and it well have Melee Range and Mage, than under those it will say Server Xp Bonus = # so say if the # is 10, and your melee is set at 100, so if you hit a 20, you times that by 100, times 10. thats the Xp they'll get. Hope this helps.
looks good :D

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How to 2x xp rate
item.dc:creator: @trublue trublue
item.description:
@trublue wrote:

You go into config.java and scroll all the way down and you’ll see the Xp for them and it will also have the Skills also if you have those in your source, and scroll up a little from skills and it well have Melee Range and Mage, than under those it will say Server Xp Bonus = # so say if the # is 10, and your melee is set at 100, so if you hit a 20, you times that by 100, times 10. thats the Xp they’ll get. Hope this helps.
